name.ja: Blade – Hedera Web3 デジタルウォレット

short.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: A Hedera Hashgraph Wallet in your Browser
short.bn: আপনার ব্রাউজারে একটি হেডেরা হ্যাশগ্রাফ ওয়ালেট
short.es: Un monedero Hedera Hashgraph en su navegador
short.fil: Isang Hedera Hashgraph Wallet sa iyong Browser
short.hi: आपके ब्राउज़र में एक हेडेरा हैशग्राफ वॉलेट
short.id: Dompet Hedera Hashgraph di Browser Anda
short.ja: ブラウザ上のヘデラ･ハッシュグラフ・ウォレット

long.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Blade Wallet - fully audited self-custody web3 digital wallet with enterprise-grade security - transfer digital assets safely, economically, and within seconds.

There are a lot of reasons why Blade Wallet is the most popular web3 wallet on Hedera, from its enterprise-grade security to the list of global partners. Designed to be simple, seamless, and secure. You can buy, sell, stake, swap, trade & collect with the fastest growing, fully audited, and regularly tested dual network Hedera wallet. Unlock the power of web3 with Blade. 

ENTERPRISE-GRADE SECURITY
Blade Wallet is the fastest-growing, security-audited web3 wallet on the Hedera network. The wallet’s security architecture was strategically engineered and is diligently reviewed and  updated in line with  leading industry best practice. 

NFTs, GAMING AND SO MUCH MORE!
Blade is championing a new course of utility NFTs for brands and businesses. As an end user, you can  simply, seamlessly, and securely transact your favorite Hedera and Ethereum tokens and enjoy Play2Earn gaming. You can also manage your NFTs and use them to access token-gated platforms and claim exclusive rewards.

UNLOCK THE POWER OF WEB3 WITH BLADE
Blade Wallet is a powerful choice for top web2 brands and businesses who want to enter into the world of web3. Leading web3 brands and businesses are also choosing Blade Wallet thanks to its innovative features that allow businesses to achieve their goals seamlessly. 

Download Blade Wallet to get the ultimate Web3 experience.
Learn more at bladewallet.io
long.bn,es,hi,id,ja:
Blade Wallet is the fastest growing, best-in-class, security audited Web3 wallet on the Hedera network. Transact with your favorite Hedera tokens, manage your NFT portfolio, enjoy Play2Earn gaming, and so much more with Blade Wallet. 

Setting up your new Blade Wallet account
 - Click ”install” and wait for app to download. Click ”open”. 
 - Once Blade Wallet opens. Click “get started” and follow instructions.

IMPORTANT:  MAKE SURE YOU REMEMBER YOUR PASSWORD AND SECRET RECOVERY PHRASE AND SAVE THEM IN A SAFE PLACE.

NOTE: Blade Wallet is a non-custodial wallet, Which means we do not store passwords, your funds, or any of your data.  Only you have access to all of this, so please make sure to SAVE YOUR PASSWORD AND SECRET RECOVERY PHRASE and NEVER SHARE THEM.  Without them, you will be unable to access your Blade Wallet account. 

For more information: check out our Help Center on www.bladewallet.io or contact us – support@bladewallet.io
long.fil:
Ang Blade Wallet ay ang pinakamabilis na lumalago, pinakamahusay na klase, na-audit ang seguridad para sa Web3 wallet ng Hedera network. Makipagtransaksyon sa iyong mga paboritong Hedera tokens, i-manage ang iyong NFT portfolio, mag-enjoy sa Play2Earn gaming, at marami pang ibang gamit sa Blade Wallet.

Pagse-set up ng iyong bagong Blade Wallet account
- I-click ang “i-install at hintaying madownload ang app. I-click ang “bukas”.
- Kapag ang Blade Wallet ay bumukas, I-click ang “magsimula” at sundin ang mga tagubilin.

MAHALAGA: TIYAKING NAALALA MO ANG IYONG PASSWORD AT SECRET RECOVERY PHRASE AT I-SAVE SILA SA LIGTAS NA LUGAR.

TANDAAN: Ang Blade Wallet ay isang non-custodial wallet, na nangangahulugang hindi kami nag-iimbak ng mga password, iyong mga pondo, o anuman sa iyong data. Ikaw lang ang may access sa lahat ng ito, kaya pakitiyak na I-SAVE ANG IYONG PASSWORD AT SECRET RECOVERY PHRASE at HUWAG IBAHAGI ANG MGA ITO. Kung wala ang mga ito, hindi mo maa-access ang iyong Blade Wallet account.

Para sa higit pang impormasyon: tingnan ang aming Help Center sa www.bladewallet.io o makipag-ugnayan sa amin – support@bladewallet.io
